snippet.title: Navigating The Labyrinth RPG - Pre-Release Gameplay Demo January 2025
snippet.description:
A gameplay demo of the Navigating The Labyriinth dungeon crawler (DRPG) recorded in January 2025. Watch the party traverse the labyrinths fighting monsters in this role-playing game in the vein of The Bard's Tale, Wizardry, and Might and Magic.

The game is currently available to wishlist on Steam at https://store.steampowered.com/app/2642110/Navigating_The_Labyrinth/ with a free demo currently available and release scheduled for April 2025.

Background music by Bloodless Mushroom.
